name: Allam Naga Keerthi
summary: A highly self-motivated IT professional with over 7 years of experience, specializing in HTML, CSS, Sass, Bootstrap and excelling in Mendix UI (both Hybrid and Native applications) with over 1.5 years of dedicated development experience.

experience.description: Designing web pages by using angular material and flexbox with SCSS. Involved in development using angular by changing theme dynamically. Implemented animations using angular4. Build 7-1 pattern in scss architect. Maintaining css using BEM methodology. Responsible for End-To-End web page designing.

experience.company: Company #1: SreeTammina Software Solutions Pvt Ltd
experience.description: Involved in mock up designs. Converted CSS to SASS. Integration of code and testing app. Converting mock-ups to dynamic HTML content in angular. Involved in improving and maintaining code quality. Identifying and solving bugs in all browsers and maintaining accessibility.
